newsitem.title: CHINA: PRESS DIGEST - Chinese newspapers - Dec 2.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Chinese newspapers - Dec 2.

text.p: Following is a summary of major Chinese political and business stories in leading newspapers, prepared by Reuters in Beijing. Reuters has not checked the stories and does not guarantee their accuracy. Telephone: (8610) 6532-1921. Fax: (8610) 6532-4978.
Premier Li Peng says development of nuclear power industry is important to sector converting military technology to civilian use.
Lamas at Tashilunpo temple in Tibet celebrate first anniversary of enthronement of Panchen Lama, second holiest monk of Himalayan region.
Taiwan Affairs Office under State Council issues regulations simplifying procedures for Taiwanese reporters to gather news in China.
Zhou Daojiong, chairman of China Securities Regulatory Commission, calls for clean-up of stock investment fund market by stamping out rampant irregularities and training more specialised personnel.
